location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Sir Roderick Murchison

mods.abstract: Letter regarding speciments that have been collected from the Persian shore of the Gulf and are being sent to him and a list of rocks collected from Cape Mussundom [Musandam].The letter also discusses the report on Pelly's travels to the Wahabee [Wahhabi] capital and his discoveries about Palgraves travels through the same region.
